snippet: The teacher evaluation system imposed by the state education commissioner is an important and necessary step toward education reforms.
abstract: Editorial welcomes new teacher evaluation system that New York State education commissioner John King Jr has imposed on New York City; contends new system, which sets  learning benchmarks, will help great majority of teachers become better at their jobs.
lead_paragraph: The teacher evaluation system imposed by the state education commissioner is an important and necessary step toward education reforms.
